answers.answer: U have done nothing wrong. Try not to eat do much starge before your test. I had gestegional disbities its not fun but u can controll if with diet and excerdize. This pregnancy will be harder if j get cause I cant excersise I sn in bed rest. But font blame your self

don't stress too much right now . the same thing happened to me and I stressed out. I went for the 3 hour test and passed with flying colors . my point is just because you failed the 1 hour test does not mean that you have diabetes . so good luck and I hope that you passed with flying colors 3 hour test .
I just failed my 1 hr too. I got done with my three hr today. Its driving me crazy too. Good luck on your test!
